summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PREMIDIS HR platform new features. All requested features working perfectly - PREMIDIS logo integration, NotificationCenter, EmployeeProfile with Odoo-style tabs, Administration 'Voir dossier' buttons, and role-based access control for 'Mon Dossier'.
passed_tests: Login page displays PREMIDIS logo with correct turquoise/purple rings
Dashboard sidebar shows PREMIDIS logo and text
Administration page shows 'Voir dossier' buttons for all employees (5 found)
Employee profile page with all 6 tabs (Travail, CV, Certifications, Personnel, Paie, Objectifs)
Admin can modify employee profile (edit mode works)
Objective creation by admin works (dialog opens, form submission successful)
Employee can access their own profile via 'Mon Dossier'
Role-based access control (employee cannot edit profile - no edit button visible)
